articles.content:
At about midnight on New Years Eve a barrage of American-built Himars missiles smashed into a building packed with Russian conscripts in Makiivka, just outside Donetsk in occupied east Ukraine.

articles.content:
American footballer Damar Hamlin is breathing on his own and now able to talk following a dramatic on-field collapse.
